metadata.Title: CVE-2014-2527 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: kcleanup.cpp in KDirStat 2.7.0 does not properly quote strings when deleting a directory, which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands via a " (double quote) character in the directory name, a different vulnerability than CVE-2014-2528.

criterions.comment: k4dirstat: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
